channel.title: Removing Quest
channel.description:
I have the dragon slayer quest on my server. and you need to complete it to wear rune armour, dragon platebody and dragon chainbody... but the quest isn't completeable so how can i make it so that you dont need to have completed the quest to wear these items? and i want to delete the quest altogether!
alot of credits will go in the server to the answerers of this question :)

item.title: Removing Quest
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Its in ( ( client.java ) ), search for the item’s ID a couple of times till you come across something relevant to your question.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing Quest
item.dc:creator: @Crunch Crunch
item.description:
@Crunch wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:372970”]Open player.java, search “q1 =”

you should see i bunch of ints. change the q1 = 0;, q2 = 0;, q3 = 0; to q1 = 15, q2 = 15, etc.etc.

helped?[/quote]

In my player.java it doesn’t have the q1 = 0 etc…
its really annoying because no one can wear alot of armours

Read full topic

item.title: Removing Quest
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Open player.java, search “q1 =”

you should see i bunch of ints. change the q1 = 0;, q2 = 0;, q3 = 0; to q1 = 15, q2 = 15, etc.etc.

helped?

Read full topic
